Beijing to host 2027 World ChampionshipsBeijing has been selected to host the 2027 World Athletics Championships, governing body World Athletics said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 20:11:34 GMT HV7S2IBMM5OI3AGSAQ7O3S2Q6Q https://www.reuters.com/sports/athletics/beijing-host-2027-world-championships-2024-02-28/Reuters运动的竞技
Chinese carmaker BYD looking for Mexico plant location, executive saysChinese electric carmaker BYD is looking for a location in Mexico to set up a factory aimed at boosting the company's share in the local market, Stella Li, BYD Americas CEO told Reuters on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 18:30:55 GMT V6C3DVYYQVKGLJUZLJTBO6ZPAM https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinese-carmaker-byd-launches-low-cost-dolphin-mini-ev-mexico-2024-02-28/Daina Beth Solomon商业汽车与交通
US trade chief rules out WTO dispute deal this week but says mood is positiveU.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai on Wednesday ruled out an agreement on World Trade Organization dispute settlement appeals reform this week but said WTO negotiations on the issue were positive and showing some progress. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 16:22:04 GMT 4TY26WJ5TVPHZJVCUA7A2CMPCA https://www.reuters.com/world/us-trade-chief-rules-out-wto-dispute-deal-this-week-says-mood-is-positive-2024-02-28/Alexander Cornwell可持续发展气候与能源
Polestar raises almost $1 bln, sees margins improving in 2024Polestar said on Wednesday it had raised a $950 million loan from a bank syndicate, helping to fill a gap left when Volvo Cars said it would stop funding the electric carmaker, sending its New York-listed shares 18.5% higher. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 14:22:58 GMT CDJ46BO5BJMDVPSUQSOALPI3BU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/polestar-raises-almost-1-bln-sees-margins-improving-2024-2024-02-28/Marie Mannes商业汽车与交通
India, South Africa block major investment deal at WTO talksIndia and South Africa have filed a formal objection against an investment agreement at a World Trade Organization meeting in Abu Dhabi, blocking its adoption in a move that observers say could block hundreds of billions of dollars in investment. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 14:21:18 GMT XJFPCQG7LRPTXDYMGNZ3​​EQTD6A https://www.reuters.com/world/india-south-africa-block-investment-deal-wto-talks-2024-02-28/Rachna Uppal, Emma Farge可持续发展气候与能源
ATP signs multi-year strategic partnership with Saudi Arabia's PIFThe ATP Tour and Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF) have signed a multi-year strategic partnership, the governing body of men's tennis said on Wednesday in a move highlighting the growing influence of the Gulf nation on global sport.
